title: Upgrading to Alpha Client
body:
So I was just approved for the Alpha client and I have a single question that, after some searching, I couldn't get answered. 

Do I have to uninstall anything (Like, the game file) in order to download the client, or will I just have two separate clients that both run the game?

replies.body: Nothing to uninstall. The two clients will operate separately, and you can always go back to the live client if you encounter bugs or simply don't like the Alpha Client. ^.^

No, nothing needs to be uninstalled for the Alpha Client to work. Just download the client and that's it.

But, you can't have both the current client and the Alpha Client running at the same time.
